
ossl-yasnippet-snippets
***********************

Contents:

* OSSL-Snippets
  * Installation
File lists related with Content:

* snippets.txt

  * Installation


Documentation for this project
==============================

This documentaiton is written in RST format and compiled in sphinx-
doc. You can read this documentation format in RST format (as is) or
install sphinx-doc, navigate to docs folders and run:

* On Linux systems

   make html
   make text

* On Windows systems

   make.bat html
   make.bat text

This will generate documentation in HTML and TEXT format in folder:

* For html: **docs/build/html**

* For text: **docs/build/text** (Included to github)
